features: ✨【GORGEOUS COLOR RETRO ROUND KEYPAS 】The inspiration of these cute rounded keys come from vintage typewriters offering you visual enjoyment and retro feeling to type. Every keyboard is painted with more than 10 kinds of color to help you be outstanding in the office.The mini Optical mouse is with modern ergonomic design,DPI adjustable(800-1200-1600).

✨【PLUG and PLAY】 2.4GHz signal delivers up to a range of 28 feet connection that allows you to work with your PC from a distance. One small Nano receiver (USB 2.0) connects both the mouse and keyboard,high speed rate of return allows the combo to ensure their stable and smooth transmission without delay and frame skip,hence to enhance your typing experience.

✨【104 Key FULL-SIZE KEYBOARD】13 Easy-to-reach function keys provides a shortcut to your music,emails,multimedia control,web,etc.For instance,you can play the music you want by simply press the Fn+Esc. This Is a Full-Size Keyboard. All 104 Keys Non-Conflict.

✨【AUTO POWER-SAVING】 both SADES keyboard and mouse turn into Power-save mode automatically,click any key or button to wake-up within seconds.Each of them runs on one AA battery (included).Low battery indication shows in the top right corner,when the battery is dying,the keyboard's low battery indication light will remind you to replace the battery.

✨【ANY REPLACEMENT&REFUND WILL BE RESPONDED IN 12Hrs 】 SADES V2020 Colorful keyboard and mouse Suitable for Windows 98 / Me / 2000 / XP / Vista / Win 7 / Win8 / 10 / Vista Mac OS. (After service: We aim to offer customer satisfaction for all of our customers,so if there is any questions or suggestions,pls feel free to contact with us,Our team will response and solve it for you ASAP).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Power-Efficient Design: The V2020 sets uses two AA batteries totally, and with three power-saving levels in work mode according to the pause time>1S,>1min,>8min Keyboard battery life calculation based on an estimated two million keystrokes/year in an office environment. User’s experience varies. Mouse battery life may vary based on user and different computing conditions. MOUSE with Adjustable DPI The mouse offers 3 adjustable DPI levels(800-1200-1600) for you to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to meet your different requirements. Plug & Play Wireless Receiver No drive needed, Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port, it install automatically. Both wireless keyboard and mouse will be connected in the same time,and start using your keyboard and mouse without software to install.
Energy-saving Wireless Keyboard Gaming keyboard with Cute Rounded Keys Wide Compatible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great KB and mouse set from SADES
reviews.reviewText: Alright, so, the keyboard feels a lot more solid than the mouse. Its not to say that the mouse sucks, it just feels a bit "plastichy"? So far it has held up really well though, so it may just be the feel of it. As I mentioned, the KB is a lot more solid. The keys feel nice to the touch, the colors are great, but lack customization for those that would like to customize it. Yes, the KB has a special key, FN, that when pressed along with "Esc", will toggle between three modes of lights. You cannot change the layout of the lights on the KB, just the brightness. It goes from bright, dim, blinking, to off. After a while of no use, the KB will go on standby and shut off until a key is pressed. This does not happen with the mouse. The mouse cycles between 4 colors. Red, Purple, Blue, and Pinkish Purple. As far as I know, and I did try, you cannot make a color on the mouse static. It will always cycle between these 4 colors. You can however, turn off the lights on the mouse by holding down the button on the top of the mouse. If you simply click the button, it will change the DPI settings for the mouse which it has 4 different speeds for it.Recently had a scare with the KB. I usually turn off the KB lights during the day, and turn them on at night. When i did this last time, the lights wouldn't turn back on no matter how many times i pressed FN + Esc. I thought I was missing the keys since I was in the dark. Initially I thought damn, its broken now.. But doing a restart on the PC made it turn back on. Since then, I'm kind of scared turning the KB off again.The base of the KB is some kind of metal. It has a cellphone holder "feature" that I haven't used, mostly because my KB sits under the desk thus the phone will not fit. But the Idea of having an expensive phone rest on some kind of metal deters me from using it.Price 5/5Responsiveness 5/5Aesthetic 5/5Feel 4/5Good purchase so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fun and eye catching keyboard and mouse combo
reviews.reviewText: I got this keyboard and mouse combo for my daughter who loves fun and spunk things to show her personality. It uses a single USB receiver, which can be found inside the mouse battery compartment, to connect both the keyboard and mouse to a computer. My daughter prefers this 2.4GHz USB receiver rather than Bluetooth because there's no lag with 2.4GHz USB receiver. I was surprised that keyboard only uses 1 AA battery, which is included, but that's because keyboard goes to sleep after few minutes of inactivity to conserve the battery life but it wakes up immediately when you press any key or button on the mouse.The keys on the keyboard are round, which is very unconventional but my daughter finds it fun to type on these and they are very responsive but more than anything, she loves the design and color pattern. Works well without any problem as you would expect from any keyboard or mouse but it certainly screams fun and character to your desk. 5 out of 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard and mouse set are great for gaming. The buttons push easily on the keyboard and the mouse rolls easy. It’s ergonomically shaped for comfort in case of long term use. It has a sleep mode to shut off after awhile for battery preservation. Great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars (UPDATE: 4 MONTHS OF USE) It's good, for the price
reviews.reviewText: (UPDATE) I bought this keyboard about 4 months ago. The color on the keys has begun to wear, and the space bar has stopped working properly. It now makes an annoying broken clicky noise every time I use it. Disappointing, because the reviews were pretty good.I use this keyboard consistently (about 6-8 hours daily) and after about a month, the paint on the keys started to wear. I didn't care much about color anyway, so it's not a big deal for me, but to those into the aesthetic of it, know that it won't last with moderately heavy daily use.It is comfortable though, and I love the sound it makes. If it freezes up on you when you try to wake it up, just unplug and plug back in the USB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set doesn't feel cheap at all and it looks super cute. Loving it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install just plug and play keyboard mouse combo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice wirekess keyboard / mouse combo that cleaned up good the cable clutter on my husband’s garage desktop PC. Plugged the USB dangle on an empty port on your computer and put a AA battery in the slots of the keyboard and mouse and everything worked without any further action on my part.The keyboard has a really nice vintage design, very unique round keys, also very quiet and not sticky at all, the battery lasts long time, been using them since day one when I received them.Great affordable keyboard and mouse combo for work from home or just replace your old ones that stop working. Does the job go me. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely loved but…
reviews.reviewText: I brought this keyboard last year in October, I fell in love with the color and style. I still love it till this day but… the keys I use a lot the letters are now disappearing on the keyboard… I can’t even see what it is anymore and the space bar is now starting to squeak after 7 months of purchase. I wanted to buy it again but if it’s going to do the same thing I don’t think it will be worth it. I’m sad about it, so on to another keyboard hunt to find one that the letter print will last and not squeak 😭
